Blackfang: It's very damaged. So bad that I doubt it would have been 
okay if we had helped it out earlier. We need to repair it before it's 
out of there.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > The black bot lifts the pod and enters the crashed ship.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Kenzo, come down here and take a look at this when you 
> >can.
> > 
> Kenzo walked to them "What seems to be the problem?"
